trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the data source for a form.
trans-unit.target: 封装窗体的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The BindingSource component serves many purposes.
trans-unit.target: BindingSource 组件用作多种用途。

trans-unit.source: First, it simplifies binding controls on a form to data by providing currency management, change notification, and other services between Windows Forms controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 首先，它通过提供货币管理、 更改通知和 Windows 窗体控件和数据源之间的其他服务需要简化了将控件绑定到数据窗体上。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by attaching the BindingSource component to your data source using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这通过附加到数据源使用的 BindingSource 组件实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For complex binding scenarios you can optionally set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property to a specific column or list in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 对于复杂绑定方案，可以根据需要设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>属性设置为特定的列或数据源中的列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: You then bind controls to the BindingSource.
trans-unit.target: 然后将控件绑定到 BindingSource。

trans-unit.source: All further interaction with the data is accomplished with calls to the BindingSource component.
trans-unit.target: 与数据的所有进一步交互被实现的 BindingSource 组件对的调用。

trans-unit.source: For examples on how the BindingSource can simplify the binding process, see [How to: Bind Windows Forms Controls to DBNull Database Values](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Handle Errors and Exceptions that Occur with Databinding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何 BindingSource 可以简化绑定过程的示例，请参阅[How to: Windows 窗体控件绑定到 DBNull 数据库值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[如何︰ 处理错误和异常因数据绑定该发生](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Navigation and updating of the data source is accomplished through methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 导航和更新的数据源通过实现的方法如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Operations such as sorting and filtering are handled through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过排序和筛选等操作来处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on using sorting and filtering with the BindingSource, see [How to: Sort and Filter ADO.NET Data with the Windows Forms BindingSource Component](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 排序和筛选与 BindingSource 一起使用的详细信息，请参阅[How to︰ 排序和筛选器使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 组件的 ADO.NET 数据](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the BindingSource component can act as a strongly typed data source.
trans-unit.target: 此外，BindingSource 组件可以充当强类型化的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Typically the type of the underlying data source is fixed through one of the following mechanisms: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> method to add an item to the BindingSource component.
trans-unit.target: 基础数据源的类型通过以下机制之一固定的通常:-使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>方法将项添加到 BindingSource 组件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property to a list, single object, or type.
trans-unit.target: -将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>列表、 单个对象或类型的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both of these mechanisms create a strongly-typed list.
trans-unit.target: 这两种机制创建强类型列表。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use the BindingSource to bind to a type, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Type](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用 BindingSource 绑定到类型的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到类型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the BindingSource to bind your controls to a factory object.
trans-unit.target: BindingSource 还可用于将控件绑定到工厂对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to do this, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Factory Object](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何执行此操作的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到工厂对象](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because a BindingSource handles both simple and complex data sources, terminology is problematic.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 术语因为 BindingSource 处理这两个简单和复杂的数据源，会产生问题。

trans-unit.source: Within this class documentation, the term *list* refers to a data collection within the hosted data source, and *item* denotes a single element.
trans-unit.target: 在此类文档，术语*列表*指托管的数据源中的数据集合和*项*表示单个元素。

trans-unit.source: When discussing functionality associated with complex data sources, the equivalent terms *table* and *row* are used.
trans-unit.target: 当讨论功能与关联复杂的数据源的等效条款*表*和*行*使用。

trans-unit.source: BindingSource provides members for accessing the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: BindingSource 提供用于访问基础数据的成员。

trans-unit.source: The current item can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property, and the entire list can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过检索当前项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>可以通过检索属性，并且整个列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Editing operations are supported on the current item through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 支持对当前项通过编辑操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although currency management is handled automatically for all underlying data source types, this class exposes a number of events, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>, that allow for customization.
trans-unit.target: 尽管货币管理会自动处理所有基础数据源类型，此类公开的数目的事件，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>，允许自定义。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged>

trans-unit.source: Data sources that are bound to a BindingSource component can also be navigated and managed with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class, which provides a VCR-like user interface (UI) for navigating items within a list.
trans-unit.target: 此外可导航和管理与数据源绑定到 BindingSource 组件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>类，该类提供用于浏览列表中的项类似 VCR 用户界面 (UI)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> can be bound to any data source, it was designed to integrate with a BindingSource component through its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>可以绑定到任何数据源，它旨在与 BindingSource 组件通过集成其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The default property for the BindingSource class is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: BindingSource 类的默认属性为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default event is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 默认事件是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Many of the members of the BindingSource class operate on the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property and simply refer their operation to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 数量 BindingSource 类的成员上表示的基础列表操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>属性，并且只引用对基础列表其操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when the BindingSource is bound to a custom implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IList>, the exact behavior of these members may differ from the behavior described in the class documentation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，BindingSource 绑定到的自定义实现<xref:System.Collections.IList>，这些成员的确切行为可能与类文档中所述的行为不同。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A> method calls <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BindingSource documentation describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A> method with the understanding that the <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A> method for the underlying <xref:System.Collections.IList> is correctly implemented.
trans-unit.target: BindingSource 文档描述了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>方法，并介绍的<xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A>方法基础<xref:System.Collections.IList>正确实现。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> class to the default property values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>类为默认属性值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> property values initialized by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的默认<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>由此构造函数初始化的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>|`true`|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |默认值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>|`true`|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A></xref:System.String.Empty></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> class and adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>类并添加<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>到指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls the default constructor, and then adds the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数调用默认构造函数，并将当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>到指定的容器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: It is not typically used by the solutions programmer, but instead by authors of design-time environments.
trans-unit.target: 它不通常由解决方案程序员，而是作者使用的设计时环境。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> to add the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>添加当前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>到。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> class with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>与指定的数据源和数据成员的类。

trans-unit.source: The data source for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 数据源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specific column or list name within the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 特定列或列表中的名称要绑定到数据源。

trans-unit.source: Adds an existing item to the internal list.
trans-unit.target: 将现有项添加到内部列表。

trans-unit.source: The Add method refers the call to the underlying list's `Add` method.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法引用对基础列表的调用`Add`方法。

trans-unit.source: The internal list must contain homogenous types.
trans-unit.target: 内部列表必须包含相同类型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property has not already been set, then the first object added to the list defines the type for the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>具有未设置属性，则添加到列表中的第一个对象定义的类型的列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to be added to the internal list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要添加到内部列表。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which value was added to the underlying list represented by the property.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引位置 value 已添加到表示的基础列表属性。

trans-unit.source: value differs in type from the existing items in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: value在从基础列表中的现有项的类型不同。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an item is added to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 对基础列表添加项之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The AddingNew event occurs before a new object is added to the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 新对象添加到表示的基础列表之前，将发生 AddingNew 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is fired after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 此事件激发后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>调用方法，但在创建新项并将其添加到基础列表之前。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 通过处理此事件，程序员可以提供自定义项创建和插入行为，无需强制派生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> parameter to the new item.
trans-unit.target: 这可以通过在事件处理程序中设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>到新的项的参数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new object created in the AddingNew event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: AddingNew 事件中创建新对象的列表中包含的类型与相同的类型必须为或将发生异常。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property when bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> because you cannot add a new <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> to the list.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>属性绑定到时<xref:System.Data.DataView>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>因为不能添加新<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>到列表。</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关提供自定义新建项功能的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject*> is not the same type as the type contained in the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject*>不是与列表中包含的类型相同的类型。</xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject*>

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 向基础列表添加新项。

trans-unit.source: The AddNew method adds a new item to the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: AddNew 方法将新项添加到表示的基础列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method sets up the following series of actions: 1.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将设置以下一系列操作︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A> method is automatically called to commit any pending edit operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>自动调用方法以提交任何挂起的编辑操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event is automatically raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>自动引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>

trans-unit.source: This event can be programmatically handled to construct the new item.
trans-unit.target: 可以以编程方式处理此事件来构造新的项。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> parameter to the new item.
trans-unit.target: 这可以通过在事件处理程序中设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>到新的项的参数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new object created in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: 在中创建的新对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>事件必须与列表中包含的类型相同类型或将发生异常。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event is not handled, and the underlying list is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, then the request is passed to the list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>不处理事件，并且基础列表是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>，则该请求传递给此列表的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the item is automatically created through its public default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础列表不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>，通过其公共默认构造函数自动创建该项。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the new item is added to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下，新项添加到列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The new item is added immediately to the internal list unless the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 添加新项是立即到内部列表除非数据源实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the new item is not committed until an explicit call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A> is made or until a new list operation is initiated.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，新的项也不会提交之前显式调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A>进行或直到初始化一个新的列表操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before it is committed, the new item can be rolled back by calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>, in which case the new item is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 提交之前，新的项可以回滚通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>，在这种情况下新项将被丢弃。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was created and added to the list.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether items in the underlying list can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以编辑基础列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: The AllowEdit property is typically used by other components to determine if editing of items in the list is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 其他组件通常使用 AllowEdit 属性以确定是否允许编辑的列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate list items can be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示列表项可以编辑;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*> method can be used to add items to the list.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*>方法可以用于向列表添加项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*>

trans-unit.source: The default value for the AllowNew property depends on the underlying data source type.
trans-unit.target: AllowNew 属性的默认值取决于基础数据源类型。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, this property will delegate to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础列表实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>接口，此属性将委托给基础列表。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this property will return `false` if the underlying list has any of the following characteristics: - It has a fixed size, as determined by the <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此属性将返回`false`如果基础列表不包含任何以下特征:-它具有固定的大小，所确定的那样<xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - It is read-only, as determined by the <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: -它是只读的由<xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - The item's type does not have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: -此项的类型不具有默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Once the value of this property is set, the getter no longer refers the call to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> getter 设置此属性的值后，无法再引用对基础列表的调用。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it simply returns the value that was previously set until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它只需返回的值之前已设置直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>与<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>设置为<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=fullName>事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: If you set the AllowNew property to `true` and the underlying list type does not have a default constructor, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event and create the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AllowNew 属性设置为`true`和基础列表类型没有默认构造函数，则必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>事件并创建相应的类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*> can be used to add items to the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*>可用于向列表添加项; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew*>

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property has a fixed size or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示的基础列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>属性具有固定的大小或是只读的。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>

trans-unit.source: The property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"></xref> event is not handled when the underlying list type does not have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"></xref>基础列表类型没有默认构造函数时不处理事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether items can be removed from the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以从基础列表中移除项。

trans-unit.source: The AllowRemove property is typically used by other components to determine if editing of items in the list is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 其他组件通常使用 AllowRemove 属性以确定是否允许编辑的列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate list items can be removed from the list; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示列表项可以删除从列表中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data source with the specified sort descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 对具有指定的排序说明的数据源进行排序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> implements multi-column sorting as a set of property descriptor-direction pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>实现为一组的属性描述符方向对多列排序。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> containing the sort descriptions to apply to the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>包含要应用于数据源的排序说明。

trans-unit.target: 数据源不是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data source using the specified property descriptor and sort direction.
trans-unit.target: 对通过使用指定的属性说明符和排序方向的数据源进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> implements single column sorting using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to indicate a property to sort by and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection> indicating whether the property contents should be sorted in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>实现使用单个列排序<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>以指示要作为排序依据的属性和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection>，该值指示是否应按升序或降序排序属性内容。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that describes the property by which to sort the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>描述用于排序的数据源的属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> indicating how the list should be sorted.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when all the clients have been bound to this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当所有客户端具有绑定到此时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The BindingComplete event occurs after all the clients, typically controls, have been bound to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: BindingComplete 事件将出现在所有客户端、 通常控制、 已绑定到当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: The handler of this event can take the appropriate action based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的处理程序可以采取相应的措施基于成功、 错误或异常在绑定过程中，通过检查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs>参数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 此方法会放弃对数据的修改，因为上次保存或加载操作，如果满足两个以下条件:-数据源实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the list.
trans-unit.target: 从列表中移除所有元素。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all elements from the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property to zero.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法从表示的基础列表中移除所有元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>属性，并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>属性为零。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 确定对象是否为列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: Although the implementation is dependent on the underlying list's `Contains` method, typically the following characteristics apply: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> is searched starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: 尽管实现依赖于基础列表的`Contains`方法，通常以下特征适用:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>搜索第一个元素开始和结束时间的最后一个元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The underlying method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -基础方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The underlying method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -基础方法通过调用确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要在表示的基础列表中查找<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: Count 属性所表示的基础列表中获取项的数目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>属性的值由修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 获取列表中的当前项。

trans-unit.target: 使用当前的属性来访问当前的项，但使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>若要获取整个列表的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of the current object, use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>, or <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定当前对象的类型，请使用<xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>，或<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the current item, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to a new integral value, or use one of the navigation methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的当前项，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>为新的整型值或使用如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>的浏览方法之一的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the current item in the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the list has no items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，表示所表示的基础列表中的当前项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>属性，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果列表没有任何项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the currently bound item changes.
trans-unit.target: 在当前绑定的项更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The CurrentChanged event is raised whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property changes for any of the following reasons: - The current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: 将引发 CurrentChanged 事件每当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>属性更改为任何由于以下原因:-的当前位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> properties change.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The membership of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> changes, which causes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> to refer to a different item.
trans-unit.target: 基础的成员身份<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>发生更改，这将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>来指代不同的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: Examples include adding or deleting an item before the current item, deleting or moving the current item itself, or moving an item to the current position.
trans-unit.target: 示例包括添加或删除该项的当前项之前，删除或移动的当前项本身，或将项移动到当前的位置的项。

trans-unit.source: - The underlying list is refreshed by a new sorting or filtering operation.
trans-unit.target: -基础列表刷新由新的排序或筛选操作。

trans-unit.source: When this event is triggered, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property will already contain its new value.
trans-unit.target: 触发此事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>属性将包含它的新值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置到连接器当前绑定到的数据源中的特定列表。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> contains multiple lists (or tables) of data, you should set the DataMember property to the name of one of the sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>包含多个列表 （或表） 的数据，你应将 DataMember 属性设置为其中一个源的名称。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged> event
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged>事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of a list (or row) in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>的列表 （或行） 的名称

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the connector binds to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置连接器绑定到的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property can be set to a number of data sources, including types, objects, and lists of types.
trans-unit.target: 数据源属性可以设置为大量的数据源，包括类型、 对象和类型的列表。

trans-unit.source: The resulting data source will be exposed as a list.
trans-unit.target: 产生的数据源将公开为一个列表。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows some of the common data sources and the resulting list evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了一些常见的数据源和生成的列表计算。

trans-unit.source: |DataSource property|List results| |-------------------------|------------------| |`null`|An empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> of objects.
trans-unit.target: |数据源属性 |列表结果 | |-------------------------|------------------| |`null`|一个空<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>的对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: Adding an item sets the list to the type of the added item.| |`null` with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> set|Not supported, raises <xref:System.ArgumentException>.| |Non-list type or object of type "T"|Empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> of type "T".| |Array instance|<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> containing the array elements.| |<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> instance|An <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> containing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> items.| |List instance containing type "T"|<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> instance containing type "T".| In addition, DataSource can be set to other list types such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> will handle them appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 将项添加到所添加项的类型设置的列表。 | |`null` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>设置 |不支持引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。 | |非列表类型或"T"类型的对象 |"T"类型的空<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>。 | |数组实例 |<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>包含数组元素。 | |<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>实例 |<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>包含<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>项。 | |包含"T"类型的列表实例 |<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>实例，包含"T"类型。 | 此外，数据源可以设置为其他列表类型如<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>将适当地处理。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the type contained in the list should have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，列表中包含该类型应具有默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: When setting a data source, if the supplied reference contains more than one list or table, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property to a string that specifies the list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 设置数据源时，如果提供的引用包含多个列表或表，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>属性设置为一个字符串，指定要绑定到的列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you make any changes to the DataSource property value, you should do so on the user interface (UI) thread to ensure that the UI reflects the changes.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 为数据源的属性值进行任何更改，你应这样做以确保 UI 反映所做的更改的用户界面 (UI) 线程上。

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 数据源属性是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>的默认属性

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that acts as a data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>充当数据源。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>属性值已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceChanged event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceChanged 事件发生后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Applies pending changes to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的更改适用于基础数据源。

trans-unit.source: When the EndEdit method is called, all pending changes are applied to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 EndEdit 方法时，所有挂起的更改应用于基础数据源。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect unless the objects contained by the data source implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法无任何效果，除非包含的数据源对象实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: If the objects do not implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface, changes to the data are copied to the underlying data source immediately after each change.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象未实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>每项更改后立即接口，对数据的更改复制到基础数据源。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression used to filter which rows are viewed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于筛选已查看的行的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Typically used in complex data-binding scenarios, the Filter property allows you to view a subset of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用复杂数据绑定方案中，筛选器属性允许您查看的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>子集

trans-unit.source: Only underlying lists that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface support filtering.
trans-unit.target: 仅基础列出实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>接口支持筛选。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: When Filter is not `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> passes this property to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 当筛选器不是`null`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>将此属性传递给基础列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property during object initialization, the call will be deferred until after initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果在对象初始化过程中设置此属性，调用将会推迟到在初始化完成后。

trans-unit.source: To form a filter value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on.
trans-unit.target: 若要形成一个筛选器的值，指定跟运算符和一个值，要作为筛选依据的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The accepted filter syntax depends on the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 接受的筛选器语法取决于基础数据源。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, you can specify Boolean expressions using the syntax documented for the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础数据源是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable>，或<xref:System.Data.DataView>，你可以指定使用的所述的语法的布尔表达式<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The value of the Filter property affects the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器属性的值会影响的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the Filter value will persist when the data source changes.
trans-unit.target: 此外，数据源发生更改时，会将保存的筛选器值。

trans-unit.source: To stop filtering the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止筛选<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies how rows are to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定要筛选行的方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the index of the item that has the given property descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有给定的属性描述符的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used in complex data-binding cases to locate the first row where the value of the field specified by the `prop` parameter equals the value of the `key` parameter This method simply refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用在复杂数据绑定的情况下，以定位其中通过指定字段的值的第一行`prop`参数等于的值`key`参数此方法只是请求引用对基础列表的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, this method calls the <xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果基础数据源为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable>，或<xref:System.Data.DataView>，此方法调用<xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, such as the value returned if no matching item is found, depends on the implementation of the method in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 行为<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，例如如果不找到任何匹配项，则取决于基础列表中方法的实现，则返回该值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>搜索。

trans-unit.source: The value of `prop` to match.
trans-unit.target: 值`prop`以匹配。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that has the given value for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 具有给定的值的项的从零开始索引<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is not of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基础列表是否为类型<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the item in the list with the specified property name and value.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有指定的属性名称和值列表中项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The Find method can only be used when the underlying list is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> with searching implemented.
trans-unit.target: 查找方法仅在基础列表时使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>实现搜索。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: This method simply refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只是请求引用对基础列表的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, this method converts `propertyName` to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> and calls the <xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果基础数据源为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable>，或<xref:System.Data.DataView>，此方法将转换`propertyName`到<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>和调用<xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>, such as the value returned if no matching item is found, depends on the implementation of the method in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>，例如如果不找到任何匹配项，则取决于基础列表中方法的实现，则返回该值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property name comparison is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 属性名称比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the item with the specified `propertyName` to find.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定项的值`propertyName`查找。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item with the specified property name and value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的属性名称和值项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is not a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> with searching functionality implemented.
trans-unit.target: 基础列表不是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>实现了搜索功能。

trans-unit.source: propertyName does not match a property in the list.
trans-unit.target: propertyName与列表中的属性不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an enumerator for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>的枚举数

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects representing the bindable properties of the data source list type.
trans-unit.target: 检索的数组<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>表示数据的可绑定属性的对象源列表类型。

trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>要作为可绑定列表中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects that represents the properties on this list type used to bind data.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>表示在此列表类型上的属性的对象用于将数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the list supplying data for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取为绑定提供数据的列表的名称。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects to find in the list as bindable.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>要作为可绑定列表中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the list supplying the data for binding.
trans-unit.target: 为绑定提供数据的列表的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the related currency manager for the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的数据成员的相关的当前管理器。

trans-unit.source: If `dataMember` is `null` or an empty string (""), GetRelatedCurrencyManager returns the main currency manager; otherwise, it checks for another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> bound to the specified data member and returns its currency manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dataMember`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，GetRelatedCurrencyManager 返回的主要货币管理器中;否则，它会检查另一项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>绑定到指定的数据成员并返回其流量管理器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: The name of column or list, within the data source to retrieve the currency manager for.
trans-unit.target: 列或列表中，数据源检索的货币管理器中的名称。

trans-unit.source: The related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: 相关<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>为指定的数据成员。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the first occurrence within the entire list.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定对象并返回整个列表中的第一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Although the implementation is dependent on the underlying list's `IndexOf` method, typically the following characteristics apply: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> is searched starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: 尽管实现依赖于基础列表的`IndexOf`方法，通常以下特征适用:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>搜索第一个元素开始和结束时间的最后一个元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The underlying method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -基础方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The underlying method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -基础方法通过调用确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要在表示的基础列表中查找<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the value parameter; otherwise, -1 if value is not in the list.
trans-unit.target: 第一个匹配项的从零开始索引 value 参数; 否则为-1 如果 value 不在列表中。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the list at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将一项插入指定索引处的列表。

trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>插入。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero or greater than .
trans-unit.target: index小于零或大于。

trans-unit.target: 列表是只读的或具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list binding is suspended.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示列表绑定是否已挂起。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the binding is suspended; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示绑定已挂起;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying list has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示基础列表是否具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the list has a fixed size, it does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the list has been created, but you can modify existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表具有固定的大小，它不允许添加或移除元素后创建列表后，但可以修改现有元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the underlying list has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果基础列表具有固定的大小，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying list is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示基础列表是否为只读的。

trans-unit.source: A list that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of any list items after the list is created.
trans-unit.target: 是只读的列表不允许添加、 移除或修改的任何列表项后，将创建列表。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果列表为只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the underlying list are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示基础列表中的项是否进行了排序。

trans-unit.source: IsSorted always returns `false` if the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 IsSorted`false`如果该列表不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list is an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> and is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果列表为<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>和排序; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对集合的访问 （线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the list is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示同步列表;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定索引处的列表元素。

trans-unit.source: The Item property represents the indexer for this class.
trans-unit.target: Item 属性表示此类的索引器。

trans-unit.source: It accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate items within the list.
trans-unit.target: 它接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许列表中的重复项。

trans-unit.source: Setting a value will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个值将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero or is equal to or greater than .
trans-unit.target: index小于零或大于或等于。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list that the connector is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 获取连接器绑定到的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class uniformly handles different data sources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>类统一处理不同数据源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: Ideally the List property should be set to a general <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: 理想情况下列表属性应设置为常规<xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: However, sometimes it may be necessary to cast this property to a more specific type.
trans-unit.target: 但是，有时它可能需要将此属性为更具体的类型强制转换。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the underlying list type, which depends on the type or value of the data source.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the underlying list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: 当基础列表更改或列表中的项更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The ListChanged event occurs when there is a change to the membership or metadata of the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ListChanged 事件发生的成员资格或元数据表示的基础列表的更改时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is raised when items are added, removed, or moved, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> properties change.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当添加、 删除或移动，项时引发此事件或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> properties will persist when this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>属性将保留该事件发生时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event can be completely suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可以完全禁止显示通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Moves to the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 移动到列表中的第一个项。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to 0, the first item in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 更改的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>属性设为 0、 基础数据源中的第一个项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Moves to the last item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 将移至最后一项在列表中。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to the index of the last item in the underlying data source, which is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 更改的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>的基础数据源，这是等于的值中的最后一项的索引的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>减 1 的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Moves to the next item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 移动到列表中的下一项。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to the next item in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 更改的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>到基础数据源的下一项的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Moves to the previous item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 移动到列表中的上一项。

trans-unit.source: This method changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to the previous item in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将更改的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>到基础数据源中的上一项的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnAddingNew method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAddingNew 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current item in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置基础列表中的当前项的索引。

trans-unit.source: When setting the Position property, out-of-range values are treated in the following manner: - Negative values are treated as 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置位置属性时，超出范围值视为按以下方式:-负值将被视为 0。

trans-unit.source: - Values greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> are treated as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 值大于或等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>将被视为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>减 1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changing the Position property will adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property likewise.
trans-unit.target: 更改位置属性将调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>属性同样。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that specifies the position of the current item in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 指定基础列表中的当前项的位置的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 值之后发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position*>属性已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position*>

trans-unit.source: The PositionChanged event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: PositionChanged 事件发生后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>属性已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>
